com.hazelcast.internal.eviction

Class ExpirationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.internal.eviction.ExpirationManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LifecycleListener, PartitionLostListener, EventListener

    public final class ExpirationManager
extends Object
implements LifecycleListener, PartitionLostListener
    This class is responsible for gradual cleanup of expired entries from IMap and ICache. For this purpose it uses a background task. Gradual cleanup is in place for IMap since 3.3 and ICache since 3.11

      • scheduleExpirationTask

        public void scheduleExpirationTask()
        Starts scheduling of the task that clears expired entries. Calling this method multiple times has same effect.

        public void onCommitMigration(PartitionMigrationEvent event)
